name: BGSTextViewWithPlaceholder
summary: Custom UITextView class that performs as a standard UITextView but includes placeholder text.
description: A custom UITextView class that performs as a standard UITextView but also enables the inclusion of placeholder text.  The placeholder label is set uisng an NSAttributedString which enables use of multi-colors and mixed fonts.  Placeholder text can optionally be displayed over several lines or automatically resized to fit on one line.
